snippet: The Brooklyn D.A. and two criminologists respond to a front-page article.
abstract: Charles J Hynes, Kings County District Attorney, responds to Feb 4 front page article discussing Police Commissioner Raymond W Kelly's tenure in New York.
lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn D.A. and two criminologists respond to a front-page article.

headline.main: Evaluating Kelly’s Tenure as Police Commissioner
headline.print_headline: Evaluating Kelly’s Tenure as Police Commissioner
